https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/q0L1SYascu7N1lF9KwJyzA4Iyv3.jpg Captain Vere, an old man, is haunted by a moment in his life when he was tested and found wanting. Based on Herman Melville's novella of naval life in the late 18th Century, Benjamin Britten's 'Billy Budd' is a gripping reflection on good and evil, innocence and corruption. Billy Budd
